locations.title: Sheriff's Office
locations.description: The official building of the maintainers of Eden. Here is where they oversee Eden, if there is any disputes to be solved, messages to be given, or newcomers to the town, seek out this building and see if the Sheriff is home. (If he is not, he is most likely in the forest, shooting squirrels with his magnum, check back later in that case)

locations.title: Waterpump
locations.description: Waterpump.....Not filled with scotsh I am afraid

locations.title: Serg's House
locations.description: A place where you can find some interesting information about the whole of Chernarus, the inhabitants and the Rent a Truck Service itself at the same time.

locations.title: Tavern
locations.description: Enjoy a good pint of ale, and share some banter with the innkeeper!

locations.title: Medical Care Center
locations.description: This is the Medical Care Center. Help can be sought out to heal your body, or heal the mind!

locations.title: The Huntsmen of Eden
locations.description: The Hunters- A group of individuals, dedicated themself to supply and help Eden in any way they can

locations.title: Gas station
locations.description: Gas station......The pumps are not filled with scotch either I am afraid, feel free to try it out though

locations.title: Bare-Knuckle-Fight-Barn
locations.description: Fight barn, solve your disputes, or join in on a arranged competitions among your fellow humanoids. No dirty tricks!
